headline: SPARK Microsystems Strengthens Leadership Team for Accelerated Business Growth as UWB Device Demand Surges
summary: MONTREAL, December 09, 2025--SPARK Microsystems, a Canadian fabless semiconductor company specializing in next-generation short-range wireless communications, today announced Dhiraj Sogani as Chief Commercial Officer (CCO) and Frank Leong as Principal Product Architect. In their new roles, Sogani and Leong will contribute organizational leadership and lead strategic initiatives enabling SPARK to maximize revenue generation and innovation for a new stage of company growth.

content.title: SPARK Microsystems Strengthens Leadership Team for Accelerated Business Growth as UWB Device Demand Surges
content.summary: MONTREAL, December 09, 2025--SPARK Microsystems, a Canadian fabless semiconductor company specializing in next-generation short-range wireless communications, today announced Dhiraj Sogani as Chief Commercial Officer (CCO) and Frank Leong as Principal Product Architect. In their new roles, Sogani and Leong will contribute organizational leadership and lead strategic initiatives enabling SPARK to maximize revenue generation and innovation for a new stage of company growth.

thumbnail.caption: Dhiraj Sogani, Chief Commercial Officer (left), and Frank Leong, Principal Product Architect (right), SPARK Microsystems
